Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi was just pulling into the parking lot at work when i looked up and saw 4 distinct orange fireballs\orbs. there was a very thin cloud cover and these objects were well below the clouds. i could not believe my eyes so i walked into work. i came 5 minutes later to double take what i had just saw and i was amazes. i watched these things for about 10 minutes until i looked away for maybe 2 seconds then looked up and they were gone simultaneously. at work i went up tothe top floor (3 story building) and witnessed 2 of the lights again but this time they hovered over the airport. i didn't watch them for long they moved very slowly almost mistook them as a light until they moved. i went downstairs to get my phone to attempt a picture but they were gone by the time i made it up. so i went outside to see and found only one orb this time and it was over the ocean. i watched this one until it just disappeared without a trace.
Summary: Strange orange orbs/fireballs hovered over town. disapear simultaneously
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Seaside
There were 2 other sightings in Seaside on or around July 27th 2013
